attributes.action: Make Cod sustainable by building government funded Cod fish farms
attributes.additional_details:
More fishing for British trawlers while improving the number of Cod in the North Sea. This will strengthen the North Sea's fishing industry allowing trawlers to fish effectively and sustainably.   

References: Harry payne
attributes.background:
'North Sea 'closes' to avert cod shortage'- UK Fisheries 

As North Sea Cod numbers steadily Improve a plan needs to be put in place to enhance and stabilize the number of Cod stocks. White fish trawlers would benefit from more fish and cod stocks would also improve.
